title: thegrayowl
author: thegrayowl
content: https://ip.bitcointalk.org/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2Fqx8cvqd.jpeg&t=647&c=j0PwadSwnUbMKgHello, I am the marketing manager of Metafarmer. Unfortunately, the organizer of our campaign on Bitcoin Talk has made an unreasonable demand and stopped the campaign after being rejected by us. Therefore, due to these circumstances, we intend to drop the bounty amount as an apology among you dear airdrop recipients. Please send us your wallet address. If any of you have the ability to manage a powerful bounty, please message us so that we can start working with you.
